name: UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle
desc: Settings that determine the appearance of the background corner radius.

items.name: case dynamic
items.desc: A style that adjusts the background corner radius for dynamic type.

items.name: case fixed
items.desc: A style that uses the background corner radius without modification.

items.name: case capsule
items.desc: A style that ignores the background corner radius and uses a corner radius that generates a capsule.

items.name: case large
items.desc: A style that ignores the background corner radius and uses a large system-defined corner radius.

items.name: case medium
items.desc: A style that ignores the background corner radius and uses a medium system-defined corner radius.

items.name: case small
items.desc: A style that ignores the background corner radius and uses a small system-defined corner radius.

items.name: static func == (UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle, UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two corner styles are equal.

items.name: static func != (UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle, UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two corner styles are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the corner style by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the corner style.
